description:
When an online game turns real, trapping its players in its virtual space, the strongest of them, Shin, rises up to put a stop to the madness. But just moments after defeating the game’s final boss, Origin, and freeing everyone, Shin is transported 500 years into the future of the in-game world. Armed with unrivaled strength, the young swordsman embarks on a legendary journey.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.
